mdx.excerpt: I explore the inputs and outputs of our local Earth by conducting a geographical survey.

frontmatter.title: Geographical Survey
frontmatter.description: We can perform a geographical survey to study our local climate, topography, geology, soil, and the lifeforms that make up and surround us in order to enhance our lives.
